blogs.title: Getting Started with React
blogs.description: React is a powerful JavaScript library for building user interfaces. Learn how to create components and manage state effectively.

blogs.title: Mastering Next.js
blogs.description: Next.js enables server-side rendering and static site generation, making your React apps faster and more SEO-friendly.

blogs.title: Understanding React Hook Form
blogs.description: React Hook Form simplifies form validation and management in React apps. Learn how to use it for clean and efficient forms.

blogs.title: Next Js
blogs.description: Next.js is a React framework for building fast, scalable, and SEO-friendly web applications by adding features like server-side rendering (SSR) and static site generation (SSG) to React
